com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.extensions

Interface ISCUIAuthenticationProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISCUISessionAware, ISCUISessionUserChangeAware
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SCUIAuthenticationProvider

    public interface ISCUIAuthenticationProvider
extends ISCUISessionAware, ISCUISessionUserChangeAware
    All application provided AuthenticationProvider will need to implement this class. It exposes the authenticate() method. This provider is expected to handle the authentication of the user.
    ISCUIAuthenticationProvider is SessionAware which means that it is dependent on the Session validity.
    This interface also implements the ISCUISessionUserChangeAware interface hence providers can plug-in their own handling of the interface
    Note:
    The ISCUIAuthenticationProvider is automatically registered with the SCUISessionListener and SCUISessionUserChangeListener rasrinivasan

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int SECURE_COOKIE_NOTFOUND
      Constant representing the error condition, when during authentication the secure cookie is not found

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        SCUISecurityResponse authenticate(SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method authenticates the user and sets the SCUISecurityContext in the given UIContext. The SCISecurityResponse will hold the status of the authentication. If it is a failure than redirectURL can also be given in SCUISecurityResponse object. uiContext of the type SCUIContext of type SCUISecurityResponse

      • getLoginPageResponse

        SCUISecurityResponse getLoginPageResponse(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                          int errorType)
        This method is called when the framework authentication capability detects a invalid request and needs to redirect the user to the login page immediately uiContext of the type SCUIContext errorType of type SCUISecurityResponse of type SCUISecurityResponse #SECURE_COOKIE_NOTFOUND ISCUISecureCookieProvider#validateCookie(SCUIContext)

      • init

        void init()
        ISCUIAuthenticationProvider init() method will be called once when the Application's implementation of ISCUIAuthenticationProvider is set.
